name: Synth&Sinner
description:
Synth&Sinners is an arcade urban driving game, in which teams challenge each other or the police to increase their reputation. The game is set in a futuristic synthwave world, where people constantly wear VR headsets to escape from an unpleasant reality. 

There are different challenge modes, all based on collaboration within a team compounded by three members.  Destroying rivals’ cars, doing actions like drifting and stunting, or winning matches allow the player to earn points. Points are multiplied if the actions are made in a collaborative way.

The presented game is a prototype and only the Police Chase mode with one map has been developed. 

Controls

Player can control his vehicle using a keyboard.
